name: Damn Dolls
description:
You are Suzi and your best friend "Ana" is missing.
The only evidence you have is that "Ana" was seen near an abandoned house in the forest and the former owner of the property was killed by local residents for being accused of kidnapping and killing a girl.

The game is in the first person, walk freely around the house to explore.

Find ammunition to load your weapon, discover hidden messages on the walls and grab keys to unlock doors.

There are presences in the house that do not want your company.

Your enemies are: three possessed dolls and a creature with huge teeth.

The game has several Jump Scare.

Damn Dolls is a game of terror and suspense, its events occurred in the 80s.

Main goal:

  • Survive the dolls' attacks and eliminate the source of evil in order to leave the house.
